name: bluealgae
short_description:
BlueAlgae is a Application Specific Linux Distribution which aims for developing different flavours of blue algae for 
1. electrical and electronics students with gEDA and related tools for electroncis designs
2. civil and mechanical students can benifit with flavour of bluelgae to be used with qcad and related open source tools
3. music lovers and artists can benifit from music edition of bluealgae
4. sports lovers can benifit from the gaming edition of bluealgae
5. STB edition of bluealgae will be used by the people to provide digital media to home.

BlueAlgae goes out of the way with latest technology to integrate wireless packages, voip services, Linux TV framework with  modified composite window manger and 
customization of window mangers to efficiently use capability of latest GPUs with integrated Video and Audio codecs.
BlueAlgae will provide live edition of distro as will as installation version with support for
one click UI for making kiosk applications.
summary: BlueAlgae Application Specific Linux distribution wih Easy build
